remarks: A kind of Aristotelian inference.  This judgement replaces the mode of inference ~ barbara when the minor premise has a particular context. Proposition 62 of [Frege1879] p. 52.  (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
frege59c.a $e |- A e. B $.
frege62c $p |- ( [. A / x ]. ph -> ( A. x ( ph -> ps ) -> [. A / x ]. ps ) ) $.
